ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
A fork of original archived [xlrd](https://github.com/python-excel/xlrd)
project. This fork aims to fix bugs that existing in `xlrd` and improve it
features. As the name of this fork implies, python2 support is dropped.
about.summary: Library to extract data from Microsoft Excel spreadsheet files

about.description:
A fork of original archived [xlrd](https://github.com/python-excel/xlrd)
project. This fork aims to fix bugs that existing in `xlrd` and improve it
features. As the name of this fork implies, python2 support is dropped.
about.summary: Library to extract data from Microsoft Excel spreadsheet files

name: xlrd3
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "xlrd3" %}
{% set version = "1.1.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 20e6ed2e5f7f8b4ab61e30faffebceff6fab348332b4c915373f0a72742dc177

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: 1

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - xlrd3
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/Dragon2fly/xlrd3
  summary: Library to extract data from Microsoft Excel spreadsheet files
  description: |
    A fork of original archived [xlrd](https://github.com/python-excel/xlrd)
    project. This fork aims to fix bugs that existing in `xlrd` and improve it
    features. As the name of this fork implies, python2 support is dropped.
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://github.com/Dragon2fly/xlrd3
  dev_url: https://github.com/Dragon2fly/xlrd3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - kynan
